Method parameters in org.jgrapht.experimental.decomposition with type arguments of type MatchedPair
protected  void MatchingStep.matchingStepV1(SplitGraph<V,E> gPrime, java.util.Set<MatchedPair<SplitGraphVertex<V,E>>> matching, java.lang.Double[][] flowVectors2)
          Deprecated. 
protected  java.lang.Double[][] MatchingStep.performMatchingStepV2(SplitGraph<V,E> gPrime, java.util.Set<MatchedPair<SplitGraphVertex<V,E>>> matching)
          Gets a fractional, partial matching and performs an averaging step (move flow vectors depending on the weight between a pair of matched vertices) ('right' computation: for 2 Matchings (a,c,w_1) , (b,c,w_2) f_c = (1 - w_1 - w_2) * f_c + w_1 * f_a + w_2 * f_b )
